menu.variant=ESPurna board variant
menu.float_support=printf float support

espurna.name=ESPurna Board
espurna.build.board=ESP8266_ESPURNA
espurna.upload.tool=esptool
espurna.upload.maximum_data_size=81920
espurna.upload.wait_for_upload_port=true
espurna.upload.erase_cmd=
espurna.serial.disableDTR=true
espurna.serial.disableRTS=true
espurna.build.mcu=esp8266
espurna.build.core=esp8266
espurna.build.spiffs_pagesize=256
espurna.build.debug_port=
espurna.build.debug_level=
espurna.menu.xtal.80=80 MHz
espurna.menu.xtal.80.build.f_cpu=80000000L
espurna.menu.xtal.160=160 MHz
espurna.menu.xtal.160.build.f_cpu=160000000L
espurna.menu.vt.flash=Flash
espurna.menu.vt.flash.build.vtable_flags=-DVTABLES_IN_FLASH
espurna.menu.vt.heap=Heap
espurna.menu.vt.heap.build.vtable_flags=-DVTABLES_IN_DRAM
espurna.menu.vt.iram=IRAM
espurna.menu.vt.iram.build.vtable_flags=-DVTABLES_IN_IRAM
espurna.menu.exception.disabled=Disabled
espurna.menu.exception.disabled.build.exception_flags=-fno-exceptions
espurna.menu.exception.disabled.build.stdcpp_lib=-lstdc++
espurna.menu.exception.enabled=Enabled
espurna.menu.exception.enabled.build.exception_flags=-fexceptions
espurna.menu.exception.enabled.build.stdcpp_lib=-lstdc++-exc
espurna.menu.ResetMethod.ck=ck
espurna.menu.ResetMethod.ck.upload.resetmethod=ck
espurna.menu.ResetMethod.nodemcu=nodemcu
espurna.menu.ResetMethod.nodemcu.upload.resetmethod=nodemcu
espurna.menu.ResetMethod.none=none
espurna.menu.ResetMethod.none.upload.resetmethod=none
espurna.menu.ResetMethod.dtrset=dtrset
espurna.menu.ResetMethod.dtrset.upload.resetmethod=dtrset
espurna.menu.CrystalFreq.26=26 MHz
espurna.menu.CrystalFreq.40=40 MHz
espurna.menu.CrystalFreq.40.build.extra_flags=-DF_CRYSTAL=40000000 -DESP8266
espurna.menu.FlashFreq.40=40MHz
espurna.menu.FlashFreq.40.build.flash_freq=40
espurna.menu.FlashFreq.80=80MHz
espurna.menu.FlashFreq.80.build.flash_freq=80
espurna.menu.FlashMode.dout=DOUT (compatible)
espurna.menu.FlashMode.dout.build.flash_mode=dout
espurna.menu.FlashMode.dout.build.flash_flags=-DFLASHMODE_DOUT
espurna.menu.FlashMode.dio=DIO
espurna.menu.FlashMode.dio.build.flash_mode=dio
espurna.menu.FlashMode.dio.build.flash_flags=-DFLASHMODE_DIO
espurna.menu.FlashMode.qout=QOUT
espurna.menu.FlashMode.qout.build.flash_mode=qout
espurna.menu.FlashMode.qout.build.flash_flags=-DFLASHMODE_QOUT
espurna.menu.FlashMode.qio=QIO (fast)
espurna.menu.FlashMode.qio.build.flash_mode=qio
espurna.menu.FlashMode.qio.build.flash_flags=-DFLASHMODE_QIO

# lwip versions
espurna.menu.ip.lm2f=v2 Lower Memory
espurna.menu.ip.lm2f.build.lwip_include=lwip2/include
espurna.menu.ip.lm2f.build.lwip_lib=-llwip2-536-feat
espurna.menu.ip.lm2f.build.lwip_flags=-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC -DTCP_MSS=536 -DLWIP_FEATURES=1 -DLWIP_IPV6=0
espurna.menu.ip.hb2f=v2 Higher Bandwidth
espurna.menu.ip.hb2f.build.lwip_include=lwip2/include
espurna.menu.ip.hb2f.build.lwip_lib=-llwip2-1460-feat
espurna.menu.ip.hb2f.build.lwip_flags=-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC -DTCP_MSS=1460 -DLWIP_FEATURES=1 -DLWIP_IPV6=0
espurna.menu.ip.lm2n=v2 Lower Memory (no features)
espurna.menu.ip.lm2n.build.lwip_include=lwip2/include
espurna.menu.ip.lm2n.build.lwip_lib=-llwip2-536
espurna.menu.ip.lm2n.build.lwip_flags=-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC -DTCP_MSS=536 -DLWIP_FEATURES=0 -DLWIP_IPV6=0
espurna.menu.ip.hb2n=v2 Higher Bandwidth (no features)
espurna.menu.ip.hb2n.build.lwip_include=lwip2/include
espurna.menu.ip.hb2n.build.lwip_lib=-llwip2-1460
espurna.menu.ip.hb2n.build.lwip_flags=-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC -DTCP_MSS=1460 -DLWIP_FEATURES=0 -DLWIP_IPV6=0
espurna.menu.ip.lm6f=v2 IPv6 Lower Memory
espurna.menu.ip.lm6f.build.lwip_include=lwip2/include
espurna.menu.ip.lm6f.build.lwip_lib=-llwip6-536-feat
espurna.menu.ip.lm6f.build.lwip_flags=-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC -DTCP_MSS=536 -DLWIP_FEATURES=1 -DLWIP_IPV6=1
espurna.menu.ip.hb6f=v2 IPv6 Higher Bandwidth
espurna.menu.ip.hb6f.build.lwip_include=lwip2/include
espurna.menu.ip.hb6f.build.lwip_lib=-llwip6-1460-feat
espurna.menu.ip.hb6f.build.lwip_flags=-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC -DTCP_MSS=1460 -DLWIP_FEATURES=1 -DLWIP_IPV6=1
espurna.menu.ip.hb1=v1.4 Higher Bandwidth
espurna.menu.ip.hb1.build.lwip_lib=-llwip_gcc
espurna.menu.ip.hb1.build.lwip_flags=-DLWIP_OPEN_SRC

# customizable printf/scanf float support (enabled by default via platform.txt:build.float)
espurna.menu.float_support.disabled=Disabled (Recommended)
espurna.menu.float_support.disabled.build.float=
espurna.menu.float_support.enabled=Enabled
espurna.menu.float_support.enabled.build.float=-u _printf_float -u _scanf_float

# combine ESP8285 and Generic from original
espurna.menu.variant.generic=Generic
espurna.menu.variant.generic.build.variant=generic
espurna.menu.variant.esp8285=ESP8285 (1M)
espurna.menu.variant.esp8285.build.variant=esp8285

# espurna-specific flash sizes via custom ld scripts
espurna.menu.eesz.1M=1M1S (no SPIFFS)
espurna.menu.eesz.1M.build.flash_size=1M
espurna.menu.eesz.1M.build.flash_size_bytes=0x100000
espurna.menu.eesz.1M.build.flash_ld=eagle.flash.1m0m1s.ld
espurna.menu.eesz.1M.build.spiffs_pagesize=256
espurna.menu.eesz.1M.upload.maximum_size=1023984
espurna.menu.eesz.1M.build.rfcal_addr=0xFC000

espurna.menu.eesz.2M=2M4S (1M SPIFFS)
espurna.menu.eesz.2M.build.flash_size=2M
espurna.menu.eesz.2M.build.flash_size_bytes=0x200000
espurna.menu.eesz.2M.build.flash_ld=eagle.flash.2m1m4s.ld
espurna.menu.eesz.2M.build.spiffs_pagesize=256
epsurna.menu.eesz.2M.upload.maximum_size=1044464
espurna.menu.eesz.2M.build.rfcal_addr=0x1FC000

espurna.menu.eesz.4M=4M4S (1M SPIFFS)
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.flash_size=4M
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.flash_size_bytes=0x400000
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.flash_ld=eagle.flash.4m1m4s.ld
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.spiffs_pagesize=256
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.upload.maximum_size=1044464
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.rfcal_addr=0x3FC000

espurna.menu.eesz.4M=4M4S (3M SPIFFS)
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.flash_size=4M
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.flash_size_bytes=0x400000
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.flash_ld=eagle.flash.4m3m4s.ld
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.spiffs_pagesize=256
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.upload.maximum_size=1044464
espurna.menu.eesz.4M.build.rfcal_addr=0x3FC000

espurna.menu.wipe.none=Only Sketch
espurna.menu.wipe.none.upload.erase_cmd=
espurna.menu.wipe.sdk=Sketch + WiFi Settings
espurna.menu.wipe.sdk.upload.erase_cmd=-ca "{build.rfcal_addr}" -cz 0x4000
espurna.menu.wipe.all=All Flash Contents
espurna.menu.wipe.all.upload.erase_cmd=-ca 0x0 -cz "{build.flash_size_bytes}"

# nothing set as default
espurna.menu.baud.115200=115200
espurna.menu.baud.115200.upload.speed=115200
espurna.menu.baud.9600=9600
espurna.menu.baud.9600.upload.speed=9600
espurna.menu.baud.57600=57600
espurna.menu.baud.57600.upload.speed=57600
espurna.menu.baud.230400.linux=230400
espurna.menu.baud.230400.macosx=230400
espurna.menu.baud.230400.upload.speed=230400
espurna.menu.baud.256000.windows=256000
espurna.menu.baud.256000.upload.speed=256000
espurna.menu.baud.460800.linux=460800
espurna.menu.baud.460800.macosx=460800
espurna.menu.baud.460800.upload.speed=460800
espurna.menu.baud.512000.windows=512000
espurna.menu.baud.512000.upload.speed=512000
espurna.menu.baud.921600=921600
espurna.menu.baud.921600.upload.speed=921600
